episode_event_sub_ep_ch0215_00_lutia/660:
Hey, Iris! Do people really call you the girl who
knows the hearts of dragons?

They sure do! Though it’s really more like
a general sense of what dragon Pokémon
are feeling.

I’d say all Trainers can understand their Pokémon
to some degree!
What did Haxorus just say?
Um... I think she said she wants to battle!

“Let’s have a great match!” or something along
those lines!
Oh! I didn’t realize your Haxorus was a girl!

Yep! We’ve been together for ages! She’s like a
big sister to me!

Though, I guess I’m the one who actually takes
care of her...

That’s great! Ali and I have been together since he
was a Swablu, too!
I wonder if Ali also wants to battle Haxorus.
I can tell exactly what Ali is trying to say!
“Yeah! Bring it on, sister! I’mma tear you down!”
That’s what you said! Right, Ali?

A-are you sure? He doesn’t look too happy with
that interpretation...
Phew! That was some great training!
Thanks for the battle, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
That was a wonderful battle, Uncle Wallace!
Yes, and elegant—infuriatingly so!
And yet!
Utterly glorious!
Wait, did you just call him uncle?

Oh, I guess I forgot to mention that! I’m Uncle
Wallace’s niece!
They look so much alike...

Hahaha, I guess they do! They are uncle and
niece, after all!

I suppose those two will be rivals in beauty in
both battles and contests here on Pasio.

Haha, you could say that! In our family, beauty is
an ongoing source of rivalry!

In the past, I was always the one trying to catch
up to everyone else...

Maybe now it’s my turn to be a role model!
Right, Lisia?
Tee hee! I’ll do my best to catch up to you!

But it’s true—we do have a lot of gorgeous
people in our family!
It must be in our genes!
Elesa is obviously the prettiest in Pasio!

No way! Lissi is absolutely the cutest! She’s
the best!
*sigh*
Hiii! What’s going on?
Whoooa! Lisia! Elesa!

Funny you two should show up at a time like this!
Those fans of yours have been arguing since this
morning about which of you is prettier!
Really? I see...
Excuse us, you two.
E-Elesa?!
L-Lissi?! What are you doing here?

We’re both grateful that you’re such fans of us...
but please stop fighting!
Lisia’s a contest idol, and I’m a fashion model...
We’re both doing our best in different fields!

It’s not about who’s the best or who’s prettiest, so
why not cheer us both on?
Pretty please?
Y-yes, of course!
O-OK!

Time to make up! Say it with me now! 
Dazzling, dizzying...
Doldrums defying!
Doldrums defying!

Whoa! That was amazing! When a model and an
idol combine their influence, they can do anything!

You used to battle with an Altaria on your team,
didn’t you, Winona?
I’d love to meet it in person someday!

You should come visit me at my Gym in
Hoenn, then!

Altaria is my secret weapon, but I have soared
the skies with my other bird Pokémon, too...
I would be happy to introduce you to them.
Awesome!
But why isn’t Altaria your partner Pokémon?

Well, it was a tough decision, because no matter
who I chose, all my Pokémon can soar through
even the most difficult battles.

But Pelipper is always trying to fly farther and
higher than anyone else...
That’s why I decided to go with her!

From one Flying-type Pokémon Trainer to another,
I can totally relate to that!
Thank you!

Also...if possible, would you be willing to 
have a battle with me?
I’d love to!

How wonderful! It’s the start of a beautiful story
of friendship!
I know! I’ll call it...
“Soar to Tomorrow! Our Memories Are in Flight!”
How’s that?
*pant pant*
OK! That’s it for today’s workout!
I sure worked up a sweat!

Looks like your daily workouts are really starting
to show results!
Th-that was...really tough...
Lisia, you do this workout every day?
Yup! Every day since I got here, without fail!

In order to really shine, you have to put in
the effort and hard work!

That’s why I’m able to keep on trying, no matter
how hard things get!
Because I really want to shine as bright as I can!

I can relate to that feeling of wanting to 
pursue beauty!
You’re brimming with energy, Lisia!

Your efforts are impressive! I see why Chaz sees
you as his rival!
Hey, Brawly!
Ready to go?

Time for some special training!
Hoo! Hah!

I made plans to train with those guys, so I guess
I’ll see you later!
Hold on, Brawly!
Could I join that special training, too?
Whaaat?!
Fine by me! You sure, though? It’s pretty tough!

Of course! My toughness is what I’m trying to 
polish right now!

I mean, I’m sure their training will help you
toughen up...

But if you keep this up, you’ll end up a Battle Girl
before you know it...
Whoa! You surprised me!
Oh! Hi there, Flannery!
Lisia and Drake?!

It’s a little strange to see you two together.
You’re so far apart in age, and you don’t really
have anything in common...

What do you mean? We’re both
Dragon-type Trainers.
Isn’t that right, Ali? Salamence?
I understand what you mean, Flannery.

However, I’ve been observing Lisia’s progress as
a Trainer for a while now.

Even through the TV screen, I could see her
dedication when it comes to contests.

I observed in her a great deal of passion, grit,
pride, and ambition, to say nothing of her
genuine sincerity!

Of course, the Pokémon League and contests are
held on very different stages...

but our aspiration to be number one remains
the same!
Oh, I see! So that’s what you have in common!
Tee hee! I didn’t realize you were such a big fan!

But you know, I’m definitely going to keep giving
my all in contests, but it’s not like I’ve given up on
the league, either!

One day, I’ll be strong enough to take you
on, Drake!
Wahaha! That’s the spirit!

I’ll be waiting for the day you challenge me on
my stage, Lisia!

Gladion, do you know who that girl is? She’s that
famous contest idol, Lisia!
Yeah, I’ve heard of her.

But I’m not interested in contests.
Or her, for that matter.
Oh, for real?
I think you two are kinda similar, though!
Hmph. As if.
No, really! Look, see that pose she’s doing?
Lisia does that all the time! Her fans love it!
It kinda reminds me of you!

Wh-what? No way! My pose isn’t for working up
a crowd!
Hiiiii! You, over there!
Whoa! She came over to talk to us!
I saw your pose just now! It was suuuper cool!

If you busted it out at a contest, I bet the audience
would go wild!
You mean...THIS pose?

Heh. So you recognize the inherent greatness of
this pose... Not bad.

Oh! But you know what? You could definitely
improve it a bit!

If you adjust the angle of your hand like so, the
audience will have a better view of it, and...tada!
I see...

Just as I thought, you two DO have a lot
in common!
episode_event_sub_ep_ch0215_00_lutia/661:
Hilda! Thanks to you and everyone else, we’re
ready for a suuuper-exciting contest!
I scouted so many promising sync pairs!
I’ll be rooting for you! Break a leg!

Tee hee! Oh come on, Hilda! Don’t think I’m gonna
let you stay in the audience!
Whoa! Hold on a second! Whaaat?!
I think I’ll name your story...
M-me?! But this is way too sudden!

You’ll be fine! I’ll teach you everything I know
about contests!

Challenging yourself to try to do new things is
important, isn’t it?

O-OK! In that case, I’ll just have to give it a shot!
If I’m joining the contest, I’m in it to win!
Yeah! Hilda’s new story begins today!

I’m looking forward to seeing you in the
spotlight, Hilda!
